name: Dynamic Lines of Life
long_contents: Explore the world of Arief Witjaksana, where unbroken lines and dynamic forms intertwine to capture life’s intersections and endless possibilities. With a blend of digital and physical elements, Arief’s work bridges contemporary art and technology, offering a fresh perspective on human experience in the web3 era.
short_contents: Explore the wonders of Ancient Egypt.

name: Modern Art
long_contents: A diverse collection showcasing modern art from the 20th century to contemporary works.
short_contents: Experience the evolution of modern art.
